page.title: 15PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: {PUBS} There a four pubs in the two villages the Efel inn and the barley mow which are in Trefonen,and the Royal Oak and the Gibrattar which are in Treflach. The Efel Inn is a border and so is the Royal Oak.But the Barley Mow is a free house.The Gibrattar Inn brews its own beer.The Oak and the Efel are the most popular.Not long ago the Barley Mow had a new pool table.The Oak is the only one which is on the main road. the Barley Mow has got a domino team and the Oak has got a darts team and it also serves meals,probably thats why lots of people go there.
